metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7647 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Adobe Flash Player before 18.0.0.255 and 19.x before 19.0.0.226 on Windowsand OS X and before 11.2.202.540 on Linux allows attackers to executearbitrary code by leveraging an unspecified "type confusion," a differentvulnerability than CVE-2015-7648.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7647` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.540ubuntu0.14.04.2
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.540ubuntu0.14.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.540ubuntu0.14.04.2').
